name: Bread Bear
description:
Bread Bear is an endless runner from the same team that brought you Turnip - Birth of a Made Man.  The game follows the titular Bread Bear as he must ascend starbound and avoid hungry birds that want a taste of the toasty Bread Bear. Collect butter blobs to speed up!

Features include:

- THREE DIFFERENT DIFFICULTY MODES

-A BOPPING BEAT OF BACKGROUND MUSIC

-CRUNCHY SOUND EFFECTS

-AND CUTE ART THAT WILL MELT THE BUTTER ON YOUR BREAD BEAR!

Originally Completed on May 7th, 2021
